page.description: Returns true if the named xdialog is maximized.

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description:
Indicates whether the dialog box is maximized.
.T. = is maximized
.F. = is not maximized

argument.name: title
argument.description: The name of the dialog box.

page.discussion: The UI_DLG_IS_MAXIMIZED() function indicates whether the specified modeless dialog is maximized.
